title: Stylish Inner City Netherlands Escape with City Views & Indoor Pool
description: Get off the beaten track with an escape to the Netherlandsâ€™ hidden, yet lively city of Eindhoven at Holiday Inn Eindhoven, an IHG Hotel. Take yourself on a cycling adventure through the city to explore the creativity, innovation and design of this - and be sure to stop for a coffee and delicious pastry on route at one of many cafes. Indulge in dishes of comfort food at the onsite all-day dining restaurant, or end your day with a night cap by the open fire at The Living bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Eindhoven, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Veldmaarschalk Montgomerylaan 1, Eindhoven, 5612 BA Eindhoven, Netherlands
